ygData.subject: Re: Fireworks
ygData.msgSnippet: The fireworks are numbered 1 through 4. The number 4 firework is the only one that will make a mob aggro on you. Numbers 1 through 3 will not pull mobs, they
ygData.messageBody:
The fireworks are numbered 1 through 4. The number 4 firework is the only
one that will make a mob aggro on you. Numbers 1 through 3 will not pull
mobs, they just make a colorful light show and say "so and so lights a
firework".

Brillian


----- Original Message -----
From: <jbuckingham@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, February 13, 2000 2:37 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Fireworks


> From: jbuckingham@...
>
> Has anyone managed to consistently get the criteria for using a firework
to
> pull a mob?
> It seem that when I get the shower of sparks and the message "<mob name>
> lights a firework" it will pull them,
> but if I get the bolt of light that tracks them, it doesnt pull them, and
> just dissapears when it gets to them..
>
> Just wondering, as it is a more colorful method of pulling than throwing
> knives or arrows
>
> Omir, Deep Muse of Errolisi Marr, formerly Voriig Kye, Gemchopper.
>
